name: V_EHI_PBA_NOTES_MC_PBA
description: This view filters out account data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of a note attached to the account.

columns.name: NOTE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the note was created. This column contains date information only. Column NOTE_DATETIME holds date and time information.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user that created the note.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Premium Billing account.

columns.name: NOTE_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the note was created.
